show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
My guest is Dr. Gerald Porter, Dean of the School of Natural Arts and Sciences at the renowned Bastyr University. Dr. <!--more--> Porter is one of the most thoughtful persons I know. Join the two of us as we talk about ”what helps us to heal ourselves and others,” ”embracing human spiritual diversity,” and encouraging alternative or complementary health practices.
 As these radio discussions often do, we move easily from the theoretical to the practical in regard to living life to the fullest.
